CustomField.description: If you wish a service invocation to always use a different class when you run apex tests then you can configure a Test class to return data instead of your runtime service. This may be very useful for example if the services implements a external callout.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you wish a service invocation to always use a different class when you run apex tests then you can configure a Test class to return data instead of your runtime service. This may be very useful for example if the services implements a external callout
CustomField.label: Test Class
